channel.title: Simple Help
channel.description:
Okay this is the coding I'm using so when a new player joins, he starts out with an amulet on.
[code]playerEquipment[playerAmulet] = 1725;[/code]
But when you go to your gear interface it shows that your wearing 0 of that item.
How do I make it show that you are wearing, just 1 of that item? So the player is able to take it off and put it back on?

item.title: Simple Help
item.dc:creator: @Halflingblade Halflingblade
item.description:
@Halflingblade wrote:

Thanks chip! It works now.

Read full topic

item.title: Simple Help
item.dc:creator: @chippeh chippeh
item.description:
@chippeh wrote:

Star, what you have there MAY not work unless he has the void set for the amount.
Just check the playerEquipment void, it should be in their somewhere (never actually looked before sorry if it doesn’t show up).

Read full topic

item.title: Simple Help
item.dc:creator: @starstorm starstorm
item.description:
@starstorm wrote:

most likely

playerEquipment[playerAmulet] = 1725,1;

you add the ,1 to show that u only want one and if this doesnt work idk then sorry but hoped i helped

Read full topic

item.title: Simple Help
item.dc:creator: @Halflingblade Halflingblade
item.description:
@Halflingblade wrote:

Okay this is the coding I’m using so when a new player joins, he starts out with an amulet on.

playerEquipment[playerAmulet] = 1725;

But when you go to your gear interface it shows that your wearing 0 of that item.
